title: Schalk Bezuidenhout popped the question, and she said yes!
text:
Schalk Bezuidenhout popped the question, and she said yes! share this

Cape Town - Local comedian Schalk Bezuidenhout is officially off the market.

Schalk asked his girlfriend Mica McKechnie to be his wife, and her response was a resounding yes.

"Yes yes a million times Yes! I love you," Mica captioned a photo on Instagram, showing off her engagement ring. In another video clip, she pops a bottle of bubbly, while Schalk sips on a milkshake.

Speaking to Huisgenoot Schalk said that he popped the question at the restaurant where the couple had their first date.

Her friends and family arrived shortly after the proposal to celebrate the engagement.

description: Local comedian Schalk Bezuidenhout is officially off the market.
